name: Jane Doe
message: I would like to inquire about travel packages and pricing for a stay at Golden Sands Hotel.

name: Femi Daniel
message: Can you provide details about activities at Mountain View Lodge? Interested in hiking and tours.
response: We have several hiking trails and guided tours. Our team will contact you shortly.

name: Mark Johnson
message: What are the best dates to visit Sunset Beach Resort? Looking for recommendations.
response: We recommend visiting during the off-peak season for the best rates and experience.

name: Emily Davis
message: Are there any special discounts for large groups at Pine Valley Retreat?
